title: Enhancing e-Learning Practical Skills: Consulting-Based Pedagogy for Blended and Online Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Instructional design competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can construct an organization-level customized blended learning design framework.
Learners can practice designing online learning activities using real-time collaboration tools at least twice.
Learners can derive improvement plans for learning modules designed based on formative assessment through peer feedback.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
